me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.components

Class HoverDetectorComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.components.Component
      • me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.components.InteractionStateComponent<Boolean>
        • me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.components.HoverDetectorComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class HoverDetectorComponent
extends InteractionStateComponent<Boolean>
    The HoverDetectorComponent executes an Action when a player starts or stops hovering its child component.
